headline: BofA double downgrades Coty and halves its target, upgrades Church & Dwight
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America upgraded Church & Dwight (NYSE:CHD) to "Buy" given company’s defensive positioning and consistent performance during economic downturns. Meanwhie, brokerage double downgraded Coty Inc (NYSE:COTY) to "Underperform" from "Buy" flagging slowing momentum across both Prestige and Consumer Beauty segments.
